name: Lakumba's Ornament
flavorText: There is a thread from the Unformed Land in all things. Lakumba, above all others, knew how to weave it. Her shrouds revealed a truth many refused to see.
flavorTextHtml: There is a thread from the Unformed Land in all things. Lakumba, above all others, knew how to weave it. Her shrouds revealed a truth many refused to see.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Reduce all damage taken by 6% for each stack of Soul Harvest you have. (Witch Doctor Only) 6%
secondary.text: Reduce all damage taken by 6% for each stack of Soul Harvest you have. (Witch Doctor Only) 6%
